mapper.insert: insert into board set title=#{param1}, content=#{param3}, writer=(select id from member where userid=#{param2})
mapper.select: select a.id,a.title,a.content,b.userid writer,a.created,a.updated from board a,member b where a.writer=b.id order by created desc limit #{param1},20
mapper.update: update board set title=#{param2},content=#{param3}, updated= current_timestamp where id=#{param1}
update board set hit=hit+1 where id=#{param1}
